title: Numarc Watch Face
summary: Curved digital watch face for Android Wear devices.
description: Numarc is a minimalistic digital watch face.It shows time by rotating numeric arcs.It's simple, easily readable, has support for 12/24h time formats and shows your device's battery level.Keep this clean design on both your smartwatch and phone - Numarc includes watch face and live wallpaper!Features:- smartwatch and smartphone settings apps,- live wallpaper for your phone,- 12/24 hour time format support,- battery indicator (with on/off switch).Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
descriptionHTML:
Numarc is a minimalistic digital watch face.
It shows time by rotating numeric arcs.
It's simple, easily readable, has support for 12/24h time formats and shows your device's battery level.

Keep this clean design on both your smartwatch and phone - Numarc includes watch face and live wallpaper!

Features:
- smartwatch and smartphone settings apps,
- live wallpaper for your phone,
- 12/24 hour time format support,
- battery indicator (with on/off switch).

Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.
